key_risks: Competitive Landscape: High competition in the digital banking space requires continuous innovation.
Dependence on Cloud Infrastructure: Reliance on third-party cloud services exposes the company to service outages and data breaches.
Regulatory Compliance: Evolving financial regulations could necessitate costly adjustments.
Cybersecurity Threats: Significant risk of data breaches and reputational damage.
Valuation Scrutiny: Concerns about sustaining high growth rates and achieving profitability.
social_issues: Cybersecurity and Fraud Protection: Ensuring robust security measures to protect client data.
Community Building: Enhancing financial inclusion and customer engagement through digital solutions.
governance_issues: Regulatory Compliance: Commitment to adhering to stringent and evolving regulatory requirements.
